mapper.insert: insert into cart(member_idx, product_idx, ea) values(#{member.member_idx}, #{product.product_idx},#{ea})
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where product_idx=#{product.product_idx} and member_idx=#{member.member_idx}
mapper.update: update cart set ea=ea+1 where cart_idx=#{product.product_idx} and member_idx=#{member.member_idx}
